column3:
A boy named Eduardo in a far away place is thinking about a girl he loves.
ewline
ewlineHe is cold. It is snowing where he lives. He lives in Argentina.
ewline
ewlineIt's warm where she lives in Hawaii. She eats fresh fruit.  Her shower is outdoors under
ewlinethe warm sun as red birds fly around her. It is nice, but she misses him.
ewline
ewlineShe remembers he is very pretty. She wondered if he would really love her always,  because
ewlineshe is older.
ewline
ewlineHe didn't care. Eduardo was poor, so he could not visit her. 
ewline
ewlineMaybe a time machine would help!! She can give back her birthdays! But she didn't want to
ewlinebring back any dinosaurs back by accident. Like last time.
ewline
ewlineThen an angel flew down from a star called the Pleiades to help her. His name was Eh. He
ewlinesaid, "close your eyes! Then remember the most happy you have ever felt! Let go of any
ewlinething that feels like clouds. Imagine puppies hugging you, and kitties purring with
ewlineyou. Imagine you are eating chocolate ice cream!
ewline
ewlineAs long as you remember how to be happy  you can ALWAYS be as young as Eduardo! And you
ewlinecan think of GREAT ways you can see him again!"
ewline
ewlineIt worked! She had an idea. Someone in a place called MR was buying stories that people
ewlinewrote. She wrote one about her & Eduardo!
ewline
ewlineIt paid for her airplane ride. Wow.
ewline
ewlineThen they were together again. Hugging each other in happiness, they said, "Thank you
ewlineeveryone,  for helping us!"
column4: one: How does she travel to see the boy?
column9: multiple: What things does the girl NOT imagine?
column19: one: What is the name of the boy?
